phases.name: Backend Implementation
phases.description: Add the /goodbye endpoint to the Flask API following the same pattern as the existing /hello endpoint, returning a JSON response with a goodbye message.

phases.name: Frontend Integration
phases.description: Update the JavaScript UI to fetch the goodbye message from the new /goodbye endpoint and display it alongside the existing hello message.

phases.name: Testing & Validation
phases.description: Add pytest tests for the /goodbye endpoint to verify correct JSON response format and content, ensuring SOP compliance for API testing requirements.
